basics.name: Brian Dang
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am an aspiring Software Engineer and Esports enthusiast. I am currently attending the University of Hawaii at Manoa and pursuing a B.S in Data Science Computer Science.

work.summary: Provide computer and network support to SOEST, the research institute for all Ocean and Earth Sciences at the University of Hawaiâ€™i at Manoa, under the Research Computing Facility
highlights: Keep up-to-date user accounts within the SOEST network servers
Analyze, troubleshoot, and evaluate the hardware and software problems of users within the SOEST network
Learned software engineering process improvements and best practices
Collaborated with other developers to identify and alleviate a number of bugs in software
Maintained and upgraded products to deliver smooth-running systems

volunteer.summary: Managed and directed the Apex Varsity team.
highlights: Managed practice times and tournmanet times
Consistently worked with players to improve on team work and gaming experience

volunteer.summary: A club that holds social events to develop interpersonal relations and connections, and reinforces computer science knowledge

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.
